text: Pázmány Péter Catholic University (PPCU) (PPKE)) is a private university in and near Budapest, Hungary. The university belongs to the Catholic Church. It was founded in 1635. It is one of Hungary's oldest and most well known institutions of higher education. ==References== Category:20th-century establishments in Hungary Category:1950 establishments in Europe Category:Colleges and universities in Europe Category:Buildings and structures in Budapest Category:Organizations based in Budapest
title: Pázmány Péter Catholic University
